Using the included JUnitEEWarTask is there a way to override the 
automatically included testCase.txt with one I provide.  I tried 
using the webinf tag of the parent war task:

 <webinf dir="${junit.home}" includes="testCase.txt"/>

But, I ended up with two testCase.txt files in the resulting war 
file.  Is there an attribute tag like webxml to override the default 
behavoir?

-Fazle
